01soccer, It might be because it's DTS audio. Try demuxing to aac or some kind of mpeg. My issues were that i like to use a flashdrive in my tv, but DTS can't stream over USB. A converter called mkv2ac3 works great, it either adds ac3 audio or converts the DTS.
